SEARCH
Package application

Class AlertePopup

java.lang.Object
application.AlertePopup
public class AlertePopup extends Object
Singleton that displays alerts on the screen. It is supposed to be initialized again whenever the user changes scene with the new primary stage.

  • Method Summary

    Creates a new alert, adds it to the queue and displays it

    Sets the new primaryStage of the app.
